abstract: Profile of musician Carl Testa, who organized the Uncertainty Music Series, held the second Saturday of every month at Never Ending Books in New Haven (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
snippet: Carl Testa has organized the Uncertainty Music Series, held the second Saturday of every month at Never Ending Books, a bookstore-cum-community center.
lead_paragraph: Carl Testa has organized the Uncertainty Music Series, held the second Saturday of every month at Never Ending Books, a bookstore-cum-community center.

headline.seo: A Music Series Where Uncertainty Is Embraced
